data.trans: Tự nhìn nhận bản thân là
data.trans_hint: Tôi tự nhìn nhận bản thân là người hướng nội.
data.en_hint: I consider myself to be an introvert.
data.content_game_1: I consider myself to be an introvert.
data.answer_en_hint: I consider myself to be an introvert.

data.trans_hint: Những người thường xuyên đi du lịch vòng quanh thế giới khá cởi mở về mọi thứ.
data.en_hint: People who often travel the world are pretty open-minded about things.

data.answer_en_hint: People who often travel the world are pretty open-minded about things.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta luôn trêu đùa bạn thân của mình.
data.en_hint: He always plays a joke on his best friend.
data.content_game_1: He always plays a joke on his best friend.
data.answer_en_hint: He always plays a joke on his best friend.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã đợi cô ta suốt năm tiếng đồng hồ và tôi đang mất dần kiên nhẫn rồi.
data.en_hint: I have been waiting for her for 5 hours and I am wearing thin.
data.content_game_1: I have been waiting for her for 5 hours and I am wearing thin.
data.answer_en_hint: I have been waiting for her for 5 hours and I am wearing thin.

data.content: have a good sense of humor
multi_answer: Have a good sense of humour
data.trans_hint: Mẹ tôi được yêu mến bởi mọi người trong khu phố vì bà ý có khiếu hài hước.
data.en_hint: My mother endears herself to everyone in the town as she has a good sense of humor.
data.content_game_1: My mother endears herself to everyone in the town as she has a good sense of humor.
data.answer_en_hint: My mother endears herself to everyone in the town as she has a good sense of humor.

data.trans_hint: Sếp của tôi nổi tiếng là tốt bụng vì ông ấy luôn nghĩ cho người khác trước.
data.en_hint: My boss is known for his kindness as he always puts others first.
data.content_game_1: My boss is known for his kindness as he always puts others first.
data.answer_en_hint: My boss is known for his kindness as he always puts others first.

data.trans_hint: Sarah được bổ nhiệm làm lãnh đạo vì mọi người đều biết cô ấy có tinh thần trách nhiệm.
data.en_hint: Sarah is appointed as the leader as people know she has a sense of responsibility.
data.content_game_1: Sarah is appointed as the leader as people know she has a sense of responsibility.
data.answer_en_hint: Sarah is appointed as the leader as people know she has a sense of responsibility.

data.trans_hint: Ngôn từ bộc trực của anh ta rất dễ làm đau lòng người khác.
data.en_hint: His outspoken words can easily hurt others' feelings.
data.content_game_1: His outspoken words can easily hurt others' feelings.
data.answer_en_hint: His outspoken words can easily hurt others' feelings.

data.trans: Bộc lộ cá tính thực sự của ai
data.trans_hint: Sau 2 năm quen biết nhau, cô ấy bắt đầu bộc lộ cá tính thực sự với tôi.
data.en_hint: After 2 years of knowing each other, she started to reveal her true character to me.

data.trans: Đặt ra tiêu chuẩn cao cho
data.trans_hint: Là một quý cô xinh đẹp, Jane đặt ra tiêu chuẩn cao cho mẫu bạn trai lý tưởng của mình.
